Columns.Description: The date and time the sub-assessment was generated
Columns.Name: TimeGenerated

Columns.Description: Information on how to remediate this sub-assessment
Columns.Name: RemediationDescription

Columns.Description: Resource provider type of the assessed resource
Columns.Name: ResourceProviderType

Columns.Description: Details of the resource that was assessed
Columns.Name: ResourceDetails

Columns.Description: Description of the impact of this sub-assessment
Columns.Name: Impact

Columns.Description: Indicates whether the data was exported as part of a snapshot when 'true', or streamed in real-time when 'false'.
Columns.Name: IsSnapshot

Columns.Description: A unique identifier for the resource that the record is associated with
Columns.Name: _ResourceId

Columns.Description: A unique identifier for the subscription that the record is associated with
Columns.Name: _SubscriptionId
